name: Eggless Raisin Cake
author: Lorena Essner

ingredients.name: c. raisin juice (add water if needed)

instructions: Boil raisins until tender. Cream sugar and lard. Add spices. Dis- solve soda in juice of raisins. Stir in the flour, then add raisins last. Bake in a loaf or layer and put together with caramel or coconut icing.
